issue.title: [CF 148] Only When Equipped - Bugged?
issue.body:
Hello, I have a minor issue or am simply not grasping how this condition works - wonderful addon btw :)

  • Attached a screenshot of the icon parameters I am using.

Basically I am trying to make a large button show only when I have rocket boots equipped. When they are equipped I want the icon to show regardless of whether they are usable (though at 80% visibility if so).

However, the button just appears regardless of whether they are equipped or not (though the usable condition is operating correctly).

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
TellMeWhen 4.0.0 beta8


> Posted by CurseForge user reducto | Imported from CurseForge issue #148 | Raw
